userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Edward F. Meylan Papers, M0310, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Typescript (partial) of Meylan's MEMORIES (1979) and photocopy of typescript of Meylan's The Essence of Humanism (vol. 1 and 2) (1976).

did.unittitle: Typescript (partial) of Edward F. Meylan's Memories. Inscribed to Pat Palmer. Sections dealing with Stanford University, 1924-1926. Mentions: Family Club of San Francisco, Leland Cutler, Professor Terman, Frederick Anderson, Albert Leon Guerard. 14 pp.
Meylan, Edward F., The Essence of Humanism, Vol. 1 1976. Xerox of typescript, 237 pp. Inscribed to Stanford Libraries, signed by author, 1979.
